keywords: ['meditation song', 'zither', 'guzheng', 'chimes', 'no percussion', 'no voices', 'instrumental song', 'slow tempo', 'relaxing music']
caption: This meditation song features a guzheng playing the main melody. A kind of zither plays arpeggiated chords in the background. Chimes are played in between lines. This song has a Chinese melody. This song is relaxing. There are no voices in this song. This song can be played in a meditation center.
